title: 18 Best Outdoor Sofas to Elevate Your Backyard in 2025, Tested
description: Go ahead and kick your feet up
author: Will Porter, Audrey Lee
excerpt: We found the best outdoor sofas for a poolside oasis, shade-laden backyard, or tight-fitting balcony—from West Elm, Outer, Article, Wayfair, Amazon, and more.
text: The best outdoor sofas are the makers of any elevated patio living space. Not only do they add a few seats to your outdoor patio furniture setup, but they’re also a reflection of your design sensibilities. If you live in a place with good weather, outdoor living may be even more important than time spent indoors—so picking out the right sectional, love seat, or daybed to pair with a cherished chaise or patio set is key when building up your collection of outdoor furniture.To prep for the warm weather ahead, we pulled together a list of the best outdoor sofas on the market—both ones we’ve sprawled out on in person, as well as other design-forward picks from some of our favorite brands. Whether you’re looking for a love seat to complement your favorite coffee table or want to pull up a seat to your fire pit, we’ve got a couch in mind for you.Our Top Picks for the Best Outdoor SofasBest Teak Outdoor Sofa: Castlery Rio Outdoor Teak Sofa, $1,999Best Low-Slung Outdoor Sofa: Article Lubek Outdoor Low Corner Sectional, $849Best Wicket Outdoor Sofa: Outer Open Weave Wicker Outdoor L Sectional, $7,100 $6,035Best Coastal Chic Outdoor Sofa: Serena & Lily Pacifica Sofa, $2,798Most Covert Outdoor Sofa: Sundays Movie Night Outdoor Modular Sectional, $5,990Best Outdoor Sofas, OverallArticle Lubek Outdoor Low Corner SectionalDimensions: 22"H x 100.5"W x 98.5"DMaterials: Solid acacia, steel, polyurethane foam, polyester fiberFabric: 100% polyesterShipping: $249, delivery ETA ranges from 3 to 35 days (US)Return Policy: You can exchange any product in your order up to 30 days after delivery. Shipping on your first exchange for any item is free of charge.Read the full reviewArticle has long been known for their sleek, modern furniture, and the Lubek Outdoor Low Corner Sectional is no exception. Not only is this couch stylish–our tester says it feels like it belongs poolside at a luxury hotel–but also durable enough to withstand a snowy Colorado winter without any noticeable wear and tear. The weather-resistant cushions wick away any surface moisture and dry quickly in the sun from more significant rain.While we tested the corner sectional, the same design is also offered in slightly smaller configurations with either a left or right chaise to best fit any space. “After undertaking a huge backyard renovation, I was looking for a comfortable and stylish sofa to be the focal point of the space,” contributor Meg Kernahan told us. “This couch is exactly that–large enough to comfortably seat 6 people around an outdoor firepit and durable enough for my toddler to climb on.”Castlery Rio Outdoor Teak SofaDimensions: 83.9 “ wide, 37.2” deep, and 30.3” highMaterials: Solid teak wood with Olefin fabric and PU foamShipping: $249, delivery ETA ranges from 3 to 35 days (US)Return Policy: You can exchange any product in your order up to 30 days after delivery. Shipping on your first exchange for any item is free of charge.Read the full reviewThe Castlery Rio Outdoor Sofa isn’t just a pretty face, it’s built to last. The Rio is tough enough to combat all kinds of weather conditions from snow to sweltering heat with minimal maintenance (especially if you use the separate cover!). Just ask our contributor Stewart Savin who told us the sofa “has withstood pollen, snowstorms, thunderstorms, and even a hurricane.”Design-wise, its clean lines and neutral color palette make it a great option for any outdoor setting. “With ample seating space and foam-filled cushions, you’ll want to curl up on this sofa with your morning coffee or after-dinner wine all year long,” Savin says. “It even boasts a three-year frame and one-year fabric warranty so you can feel secure investing in your patio or deck space.”Serena & Lily Pacifica SofaDimensions: 84–108” wide, 34” deep, 30” tallMaterials: Water- and mildew-resistant performance fabric, all-weather foam and polyester fill, powdercoated aluminum frameShipping: White glove delivery is available on an unlimited number of eligible items at a flat rate starting at $299, except to addresses in Alaska or Canada. Serena & Lily’s delivery partner will contact you one to two weeks prior to the delivery date to schedule the appointment.Return Policy: 30-day return policy for most items, unless you’ve placed a custom order or purchased from an Outlet location or floor model. All custom items require a 50% non-refundable deposit, and Outlet purchases and floor models are sold without warranty and can’t be returned.Read the full reviewBy now, we all know about Serena & Lily and their splurgeworthy, coastal-chic finds. For a Nancy Meyers-approved home design, their breezy-yet-elevated indoor and outdoor furniture is a must—most notably, the Pacifica Sofa. The price point isn’t the most approachable, but the solid construction and the brand’s separately sold protective cover can help maintain its condition for years to come.“Over the past three years, it’s managed to hold up against the occasional rainstorm and humid summer days near the Southern California coast,” tester Blake Solomon says. There are no signs of wear and tear, and it surprisingly looks as good as new after years of outdoor dinners, parties, and pool days. When it does need a good clean, though, you can unzip the cushion covers and throw them in the wash, and hose down the frame (a major perk when my toddler decides to eat peanut butter poolside).”Sundays Movie Night Outdoor 4-Piece Modular SectionalDimensions: 84–108” wide, 34” deep, 30” tallMaterials: Water- and mildew-resistant performance fabric, all-weather foam and polyester fill, powder-coated aluminum frameShipping: White glove delivery is available on an unlimited number of eligible items at a flat rate starting at $299, except to addresses in Alaska or Canada. Serena & Lily’s delivery partner will contact you one to two weeks prior to the delivery date to schedule the appointment.Return Policy: 30-day return policy for most items, unless you’ve placed a custom order or purchased from an Outlet location or floor model. All custom items require a 50% non-refundable deposit, and Outlet purchases and floor models are sold without warranty and can’t be returned.Read the full reviewWe’ve seen (and sat on) a lot of outdoor sofas in our day and after just a month of use, can confirm that the aptly named Sundays Movie Night is one of the very best, designed for long hours of lounging. The brand’s West Coast sensibility and easygoing design combine perfectly in this squishy, sensibly designed sofa that’s ideal for outdoor film screenings (or for marathoning episodes of The Traitors, like tester Will Porter has been doing).“The couch has easily withstood the sudden onslaught of rain we’ve had in Los Angeles, and on sunny days, it’s the perfect place for basking, whether you’re splayed out like a starfish or want to curl up with that beach read you didn’t finish last time you hit the coast,” says Porter. “It matches any design style and thanks to a clever modular design, can be arranged in a number of ways to get the right fit in your space.”AllModern Abra Metal Outdoor LoveseatDimensions: 84–108” wide, 34” deep, 30” tallMaterials: Water- and mildew-resistant performance fabric, all-weather foam and polyester fill, powder-coated aluminum frameShipping: White glove delivery is available on an unlimited number of eligible items at a flat rate starting at $299, except to addresses in Alaska or Canada. Serena & Lily’s delivery partner will contact you one to two weeks prior to the delivery date to schedule the appointment.Return Policy: 30-day return policy for most items, unless you’ve placed a custom order or purchased from an Outlet location or floor model. All custom items require a 50% non-refundable deposit, and Outlet purchases and floor models are sold without warranty and can’t be returned.Read the full reviewThe Wayfair Abra loveseat is a sleek addition to any outdoor space, delivering sought after Scandinavian vibes on a budget. Retailing at $1,026 (but often on sale), it comes in three frame colors—dark green, black, and dark blue. Delivery is straightforward since the loveseat arrives fully assembled, though at 73 pounds, you might want a buddy to help move it. Built from powder-coated steel, it’s designed to feel sturdy and supportive, but senior digital design editor Zoë Sessums says not to expect the same kind of sink-in-and-lounge comfort as softer seating. It blends well with different outdoor aesthetics, especially if you’re into a clean, minimalist look. It’s also easy to clean and lacking sharp edges, though running into it might leave a mark. If you’re after a chic, durable loveseat for socializing rather than sprawling, this one’s a solid choice.Signature Design By Ashley Paradise Trail SofaDimensions: 114"W x 76"D x 32"HMaterials: Fabric - 100% solution-dyed Olefin; Cushions - Polyester fibre fill and quick-dry outdoor foam wrapped in a waterproof jacket; Frame - AluminumShipping: Free white glove shipping on all orders in Canada and the continental US. Right now, delivery time is set at about two months.Return Policy: 30 days. In-home delivery returns are $150 and doorstep delivery returns are $75Read the full reviewAfter scouring high and low, in-person and online, tester Kristi Kellogg finally found an outdoor couch that checked all the boxes on her wishlist with this Signature Design By Ashley Paradise Trail Sofa. “Big, beautiful, and built to last, this sofa has a higher back, deeper seats, and thicker cushions than anything else I could find,” she says. “It's as comfortable as our indoor sofa, and I could easily stretch out and take a nap on it (as could my husband, who's 6'3!).” Nearly a year after purchasing it, the couple is happy to report it has also proven durable and held up very well. They loved it so much that they ended up buying the matching loveseat and swivel chairs.Other Outdoor Sofas We RecommendCastlery Malta Outdoor LoveseatYou may not be able to spend summer in the Mediterranean, but the Malta love seat from Castlery brings the same vibes to your back patio. The inviting, curved frame looks excellent poolside but will fit in with any wicker patio furniture set—whether you’re getting some sun post dip or are avoiding the rain on your covered porch.Outer Charcoal Aluminum Outdoor Sofa - 3 SeatOuter is easily one of our favorite outdoor furniture brands. Its OuterWeave fabric is machine-washable, fade-resistant, and DWR-finished for water resistance. The sofa’s frame also features a super-weather-resistant powder-coated aluminum that stops rust and decay. Five fabric color options and a modular design make this a versatile sofa that works with other Outer furniture or with sets you may already own.Neighbor Bluff SofaNeighbor’s Bluff Teak sofa is peak outdoor luxury. The natural wood grain and handcrafted detail make this a beautiful addition to your patio. Its soft throw pillows and floating cushions give it the feel of an indoor couch, and SVLK-certified teak, fade-proof Sunbrella fabric, and quick-dry cushions provide all of the features you need to get the most from your outdoor furniture.Sand & Stable Jacqueline Acacia Outdoor Patio DaybedMade with durable acacia wood and held together with galvanized steel hardware, the Sand and Stable Jacqueline Daybed is ideal for patio spaces that require versatility. Whether you leave the armrests up to create a 2-seater love seat, fold them down for maximum seating, or put down one at a time to create a chaise lounge situation, this is a comfy solution for those who want to maximize their space.Pottery Barn Woodside Eucalyptus Outdoor SofaThe Woodside Eucalyptus collection from Pottery Barn is full of tiny details that really make a difference. Mortise-and-tenon joinery adds structural integrity that you don’t normally get from simple hardware. The subtle design is elevated enough to stand out among its peers but casual enough for lounging on any patio. One thing to note: Seat cushions are sold separately, so make sure you add them to your cart too.AllModern Louise Wide Loveseat with CushionsAs one of Wayfair’s more elevated brands, AllModern doesn’t always offer up the retailer’s most affordable options—but we think the brand’s Louise Wide love seat is an incredible value at less than $300. The low-slung wood frame just begs to be lounged upon, while the white water-resistant cushions add a clean finish.Yardbird Colby Aluminum Large SectionalThis highly versatile patio sectional is made to play nicely with any furniture and any design. Tall-back cushions and an upright sit make this an ideal sofa for chatting with friends. The commercial-grade aluminum frame is rust proof and cushions are made with top-of-the-line Sunbrella fabric, which is easy to clean and stain-resistant.West Elm Kavala Outdoor SofaWeather-resistant and machine-washable upholstery has come a long way, so you’re no longer required to be satisfied with sun-faded navy or gray cushion covers in the backyard. The deep green modern lounger is just different enough from the standard shades of most outdoor furniture, while its 60-inch length provides ample space for one person to spread out or for two to comfortably sit on. The upholstery has a rope-like texture that fits in well outdoors and the shape reminds us of our favorite bean-bag chairs.Serena & Lily Hampton Modular Armed SofaThe Hampton sofa from Serena & Lily is designed with Long Island luxury in mind. Custom made in the USA, the Hampton provides all-weather comfort with living room-worthy looks, perfect for indoor/outdoor spaces or covered patios. The modular design is easy to build upon over time and you can pick from over 40 fabric options to ensure you get exactly what you want.Design Within Reach Softlands Outdoor SofaThis list wouldn't be complete without outdoor seating from Design Within Reach. The Softlands Outdoor Sofa is a comfy two-seater made from solid teak and finished with a just-nautical-enough all-weather rope detail that transports us straight to Martha’s Vineyard. Like many other retailers we've featured, DWR also uses UV-resistant Sunbrella fabric on the cushions.Anthropologie Tassa Outdoor L-Shaped SectionalThis oversized L-shaped sectional is soft and easy to sink into. Each one is made to order in one of five Sunbrella colorways and easily seats three to five people. A marine-grade, UV-resistant frame, and removable, porous cushions mean this couch is at home pool- or lakeside, though we think it’s hard to beat next to a fire pit under the shade of a huge shade tree.Threshold Purcell Wood Patio LoveseatThis Target find exudes style without the steep price. The Threshold Purcell love seat features water- and sun-resistant DuraSeason fabric cushions and a mid-century-inspired wood frame. The white cushions are thick and plush, something we don’t usually see on more affordable patio furniture options.
html:
The best outdoor sofas are the makers of any elevated patio living space. Not only do they add a few seats to your outdoor patio furniture setup, but they’re also a reflection of your design sensibilities. If you live in a place with good weather, outdoor living may be even more important than time spent indoors—so picking out the right sectional, love seat, or daybed to pair with a cherished chaise or patio set is key when building up your collection of outdoor furniture.

To prep for the warm weather ahead, we pulled together a list of the best outdoor sofas on the market—both ones we’ve sprawled out on in person, as well as other design-forward picks from some of our favorite brands. Whether you’re looking for a love seat to complement your favorite coffee table or want to pull up a seat to your fire pit, we’ve got a couch in mind for you.

Our Top Picks for the Best Outdoor Sofas

  • Best Teak Outdoor Sofa: Castlery Rio Outdoor Teak Sofa, $1,999
  • Best Low-Slung Outdoor Sofa: Article Lubek Outdoor Low Corner Sectional, $849
  • Best Wicket Outdoor Sofa: Outer Open Weave Wicker Outdoor L Sectional, $7,100 $6,035
  • Best Coastal Chic Outdoor Sofa: Serena & Lily Pacifica Sofa, $2,798
  • Most Covert Outdoor Sofa: Sundays Movie Night Outdoor Modular Sectional, $5,990

Best Outdoor Sofas, Overall

Article Lubek Outdoor Low Corner Sectional

  • Dimensions: 22"H x 100.5"W x 98.5"D
  • Materials: Solid acacia, steel, polyurethane foam, polyester fiber
  • Fabric: 100% polyester
  • Shipping: $249, delivery ETA ranges from 3 to 35 days (US)
  • Return Policy: You can exchange any product in your order up to 30 days after delivery. Shipping on your first exchange for any item is free of charge.

Read the full review

Article has long been known for their sleek, modern furniture, and the Lubek Outdoor Low Corner Sectional is no exception. Not only is this couch stylish–our tester says it feels like it belongs poolside at a luxury hotel–but also durable enough to withstand a snowy Colorado winter without any noticeable wear and tear. The weather-resistant cushions wick away any surface moisture and dry quickly in the sun from more significant rain.

While we tested the corner sectional, the same design is also offered in slightly smaller configurations with either a left or right chaise to best fit any space. “After undertaking a huge backyard renovation, I was looking for a comfortable and stylish sofa to be the focal point of the space,” contributor Meg Kernahan told us. “This couch is exactly that–large enough to comfortably seat 6 people around an outdoor firepit and durable enough for my toddler to climb on.”

Castlery Rio Outdoor Teak Sofa

  • Dimensions: 83.9 “ wide, 37.2” deep, and 30.3” high
  • Materials: Solid teak wood with Olefin fabric and PU foam
  • Shipping: $249, delivery ETA ranges from 3 to 35 days (US)
  • Return Policy: You can exchange any product in your order up to 30 days after delivery. Shipping on your first exchange for any item is free of charge.

Read the full review

The Castlery Rio Outdoor Sofa isn’t just a pretty face, it’s built to last. The Rio is tough enough to combat all kinds of weather conditions from snow to sweltering heat with minimal maintenance (especially if you use the separate cover!). Just ask our contributor Stewart Savin who told us the sofa “has withstood pollen, snowstorms, thunderstorms, and even a hurricane.”

Design-wise, its clean lines and neutral color palette make it a great option for any outdoor setting. “With ample seating space and foam-filled cushions, you’ll want to curl up on this sofa with your morning coffee or after-dinner wine all year long,” Savin says. “It even boasts a three-year frame and one-year fabric warranty so you can feel secure investing in your patio or deck space.”

Serena & Lily Pacifica Sofa

  • Dimensions: 84–108” wide, 34” deep, 30” tall
  • Materials: Water- and mildew-resistant performance fabric, all-weather foam and polyester fill, powdercoated aluminum frame
  • Shipping: White glove delivery is available on an unlimited number of eligible items at a flat rate starting at $299, except to addresses in Alaska or Canada. Serena & Lily’s delivery partner will contact you one to two weeks prior to the delivery date to schedule the appointment.
  • Return Policy: 30-day return policy for most items, unless you’ve placed a custom order or purchased from an Outlet location or floor model. All custom items require a 50% non-refundable deposit, and Outlet purchases and floor models are sold without warranty and can’t be returned.

Read the full review

By now, we all know about Serena & Lily and their splurgeworthy, coastal-chic finds. For a Nancy Meyers-approved home design, their breezy-yet-elevated indoor and outdoor furniture is a must—most notably, the Pacifica Sofa. The price point isn’t the most approachable, but the solid construction and the brand’s separately sold protective cover can help maintain its condition for years to come.

“Over the past three years, it’s managed to hold up against the occasional rainstorm and humid summer days near the Southern California coast,” tester Blake Solomon says. There are no signs of wear and tear, and it surprisingly looks as good as new after years of outdoor dinners, parties, and pool days. When it does need a good clean, though, you can unzip the cushion covers and throw them in the wash, and hose down the frame (a major perk when my toddler decides to eat peanut butter poolside).”

Sundays Movie Night Outdoor 4-Piece Modular Sectional

  • Dimensions: 84–108” wide, 34” deep, 30” tall
  • Materials: Water- and mildew-resistant performance fabric, all-weather foam and polyester fill, powder-coated aluminum frame
  • Shipping: White glove delivery is available on an unlimited number of eligible items at a flat rate starting at $299, except to addresses in Alaska or Canada. Serena & Lily’s delivery partner will contact you one to two weeks prior to the delivery date to schedule the appointment.
  • Return Policy: 30-day return policy for most items, unless you’ve placed a custom order or purchased from an Outlet location or floor model. All custom items require a 50% non-refundable deposit, and Outlet purchases and floor models are sold without warranty and can’t be returned.

Read the full review

We’ve seen (and sat on) a lot of outdoor sofas in our day and after just a month of use, can confirm that the aptly named Sundays Movie Night is one of the very best, designed for long hours of lounging. The brand’s West Coast sensibility and easygoing design combine perfectly in this squishy, sensibly designed sofa that’s ideal for outdoor film screenings (or for marathoning episodes of The Traitors, like tester Will Porter has been doing).

“The couch has easily withstood the sudden onslaught of rain we’ve had in Los Angeles, and on sunny days, it’s the perfect place for basking, whether you’re splayed out like a starfish or want to curl up with that beach read you didn’t finish last time you hit the coast,” says Porter. “It matches any design style and thanks to a clever modular design, can be arranged in a number of ways to get the right fit in your space.”

AllModern Abra Metal Outdoor Loveseat

  • Dimensions: 84–108” wide, 34” deep, 30” tall
  • Materials: Water- and mildew-resistant performance fabric, all-weather foam and polyester fill, powder-coated aluminum frame
  • Shipping: White glove delivery is available on an unlimited number of eligible items at a flat rate starting at $299, except to addresses in Alaska or Canada. Serena & Lily’s delivery partner will contact you one to two weeks prior to the delivery date to schedule the appointment.
  • Return Policy: 30-day return policy for most items, unless you’ve placed a custom order or purchased from an Outlet location or floor model. All custom items require a 50% non-refundable deposit, and Outlet purchases and floor models are sold without warranty and can’t be returned.

Read the full review

The Wayfair Abra loveseat is a sleek addition to any outdoor space, delivering sought after Scandinavian vibes on a budget. Retailing at $1,026 (but often on sale), it comes in three frame colors—dark green, black, and dark blue. Delivery is straightforward since the loveseat arrives fully assembled, though at 73 pounds, you might want a buddy to help move it. Built from powder-coated steel, it’s designed to feel sturdy and supportive, but senior digital design editor Zoë Sessums says not to expect the same kind of sink-in-and-lounge comfort as softer seating. It blends well with different outdoor aesthetics, especially if you’re into a clean, minimalist look. It’s also easy to clean and lacking sharp edges, though running into it might leave a mark. If you’re after a chic, durable loveseat for socializing rather than sprawling, this one’s a solid choice.

Signature Design By Ashley Paradise Trail Sofa

  • Dimensions: 114"W x 76"D x 32"H
  • Materials: Fabric - 100% solution-dyed Olefin; Cushions - Polyester fibre fill and quick-dry outdoor foam wrapped in a waterproof jacket; Frame - Aluminum
  • Shipping: Free white glove shipping on all orders in Canada and the continental US. Right now, delivery time is set at about two months.
  • Return Policy: 30 days. In-home delivery returns are $150 and doorstep delivery returns are $75

Read the full review

After scouring high and low, in-person and online, tester Kristi Kellogg finally found an outdoor couch that checked all the boxes on her wishlist with this Signature Design By Ashley Paradise Trail Sofa. “Big, beautiful, and built to last, this sofa has a higher back, deeper seats, and thicker cushions than anything else I could find,” she says. “It's as comfortable as our indoor sofa, and I could easily stretch out and take a nap on it (as could my husband, who's 6'3!).” Nearly a year after purchasing it, the couple is happy to report it has also proven durable and held up very well. They loved it so much that they ended up buying the matching loveseat and swivel chairs.

Other Outdoor Sofas We Recommend

Castlery Malta Outdoor Loveseat

You may not be able to spend summer in the Mediterranean, but the Malta love seat from Castlery brings the same vibes to your back patio. The inviting, curved frame looks excellent poolside but will fit in with any wicker patio furniture set—whether you’re getting some sun post dip or are avoiding the rain on your covered porch.

Outer Charcoal Aluminum Outdoor Sofa - 3 Seat

Outer is easily one of our favorite outdoor furniture brands. Its OuterWeave fabric is machine-washable, fade-resistant, and DWR-finished for water resistance. The sofa’s frame also features a super-weather-resistant powder-coated aluminum that stops rust and decay. Five fabric color options and a modular design make this a versatile sofa that works with other Outer furniture or with sets you may already own.

Neighbor Bluff Sofa

Neighbor’s Bluff Teak sofa is peak outdoor luxury. The natural wood grain and handcrafted detail make this a beautiful addition to your patio. Its soft throw pillows and floating cushions give it the feel of an indoor couch, and SVLK-certified teak, fade-proof Sunbrella fabric, and quick-dry cushions provide all of the features you need to get the most from your outdoor furniture.

Sand & Stable Jacqueline Acacia Outdoor Patio Daybed

Made with durable acacia wood and held together with galvanized steel hardware, the Sand and Stable Jacqueline Daybed is ideal for patio spaces that require versatility. Whether you leave the armrests up to create a 2-seater love seat, fold them down for maximum seating, or put down one at a time to create a chaise lounge situation, this is a comfy solution for those who want to maximize their space.

Pottery Barn Woodside Eucalyptus Outdoor Sofa

The Woodside Eucalyptus collection from Pottery Barn is full of tiny details that really make a difference. Mortise-and-tenon joinery adds structural integrity that you don’t normally get from simple hardware. The subtle design is elevated enough to stand out among its peers but casual enough for lounging on any patio. One thing to note: Seat cushions are sold separately, so make sure you add them to your cart too.

AllModern Louise Wide Loveseat with Cushions

As one of Wayfair’s more elevated brands, AllModern doesn’t always offer up the retailer’s most affordable options—but we think the brand’s Louise Wide love seat is an incredible value at less than $300. The low-slung wood frame just begs to be lounged upon, while the white water-resistant cushions add a clean finish.

Yardbird Colby Aluminum Large Sectional

This highly versatile patio sectional is made to play nicely with any furniture and any design. Tall-back cushions and an upright sit make this an ideal sofa for chatting with friends. The commercial-grade aluminum frame is rust proof and cushions are made with top-of-the-line Sunbrella fabric, which is easy to clean and stain-resistant.

West Elm Kavala Outdoor Sofa

Weather-resistant and machine-washable upholstery has come a long way, so you’re no longer required to be satisfied with sun-faded navy or gray cushion covers in the backyard. The deep green modern lounger is just different enough from the standard shades of most outdoor furniture, while its 60-inch length provides ample space for one person to spread out or for two to comfortably sit on. The upholstery has a rope-like texture that fits in well outdoors and the shape reminds us of our favorite bean-bag chairs.

Serena & Lily Hampton Modular Armed Sofa

The Hampton sofa from Serena & Lily is designed with Long Island luxury in mind. Custom made in the USA, the Hampton provides all-weather comfort with living room-worthy looks, perfect for indoor/outdoor spaces or covered patios. The modular design is easy to build upon over time and you can pick from over 40 fabric options to ensure you get exactly what you want.

Design Within Reach Softlands Outdoor Sofa

This list wouldn't be complete without outdoor seating from Design Within Reach. The Softlands Outdoor Sofa is a comfy two-seater made from solid teak and finished with a just-nautical-enough all-weather rope detail that transports us straight to Martha’s Vineyard. Like many other retailers we've featured, DWR also uses UV-resistant Sunbrella fabric on the cushions.

Anthropologie Tassa Outdoor L-Shaped Sectional

This oversized L-shaped sectional is soft and easy to sink into. Each one is made to order in one of five Sunbrella colorways and easily seats three to five people. A marine-grade, UV-resistant frame, and removable, porous cushions mean this couch is at home pool- or lakeside, though we think it’s hard to beat next to a fire pit under the shade of a huge shade tree.

Threshold Purcell Wood Patio Loveseat

This Target find exudes style without the steep price. The Threshold Purcell love seat features water- and sun-resistant DuraSeason fabric cushions and a mid-century-inspired wood frame. The white cushions are thick and plush, something we don’t usually see on more affordable patio furniture options.
